nodes.text: Kait was a woman who worked for the Oblee crime lord Nirama during the time of the Clone Wars.

When Nirama, discovered that the Believers had a seceret lab of Ipsus, he wished to discuss this with the heroes of Cularin, so he sent Kait to find them on Tolea Biqua and ask them to meet him a Riboga's Barge. Kait found the heroes and told them that someone wanted to meet them, but tried to get them to pay her to tell them who it was. Afterwards, she give them a recording rod with a message from Nirama on.
